data.meanings: cause, reason, way/path/road, necessity, means of access, responsibility, method/manner, plea to allege.. fi sabil Allah - in the way of Allah, in the cause of Allah, to carry the message of Allah.. ibn al-sabil - traveller, way farer, forlorn traveller.. salsabil - It is made up of two words: sal (ask, enquire about) & sabil (way), salsala - easy, sweet, rapid flowing water.
